detect_objects.name: Detect Objects
detect_objects.description: Detect objects, scenes, or other features in images and optionally save processed images with bounding boxes.

modes.name: Detection Modes
modes.description: Select one or more detection modes to apply. Defaults to "multiobject" if not specified.

file_out.name: Output File Path
file_out.description: Template for path to save processed image with bounding boxes.

num_snapshots.name: Number of Snapshots
num_snapshots.description: Number of snapshots to capture from the camera. Defaults to 1.

bounding_boxes.name: Bounding boxes display style
bounding_boxes.description: Configure how detected objects should be visualized in the output image. Defaults to "rus" (Russian labels).

snapshot_interval_sec.name: Snapshot Interval
snapshot_interval_sec.description: Interval in seconds between capturing snapshots. Defaults to 0.5 seconds.

max_retries.name: Maximum Retries
max_retries.description: Number of retry attempts for API requests in case of timeouts or temporary errors. Defaults to 5.

detailed.name: Detailed Results
detailed.description: Return detailed recognition results with coordinates and confidence scores.
